entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` produces invalid pdb #110096
  • Incorrect CurrentCulture derived from OS in .NET 8 runtime #110095
  • Incorrect buffer size check in Convert.TryToHexString / Convert.TryToHexStringLower #110094
  • [wasm] Out of memory exception in System.Xml.XmlWriterApiTests.TCFullEndElement tests #110090
  • Memory corruption leading to Access Violation in .NET 9 using parallel reads on a Trie object #110088
  • ImmutableList inconsistency with List #110081
  • [DataAnnotations] LocalizableString does not work with internal resource types #110073
  • Async thread's Activiy.Current is set incorrectly and cannot be rolled back #110072

Closed

  • XML signing: support detached signature for URI reference #20009
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml feature requests #20429
    Future
  • SignedXml detailed failure feedback inaccessible #23358
    Future
  • Add HTTP URI support to SignedXml #26893
    Future
  • Proposal: Make Utils.BuildBagOfCerts an extension point #23703
    Future
  • Add a SignedXml.CheckSignature method that returns information about the signed elements #27263
    Future
  • Add Custom TSA During Digital XML Signature #42523
    Future
  • SignedXml cannot validate signature that contain XPath transforms #82363
    Future
  • SignedXml. Ability to call SignedInfo verification or improve return type. #73959
    Future
  • SignedXml - refuses valid signed XML file #21451
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(newLayoutCost < currLayoutCost) || Compiler::fgProfileWeightsEqual(newLayoutCost, currLayoutCost, 0.001)' during 'Optimize layout' #109984
    10.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' during 'Generate code' #109973
    10.0.0
  • [.NET 9.0 Regression] "Credentials supplied to the package were not recognized" when using certificates with wcf client #110067
  • C++ crashes when calling any function in nativeaot shared library #110074
  • UnsafeAccessor does not work for generic constructors, .NET 9 #110054
  • Unable to use ICustomTypeDescriptor in C++/CLI #109950
  • [API Proposal]: IndexOf extension method on IEnumerable<T> #110045
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Version 9.0: UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups() throws System.UriFormatException: Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed. #109858
    10.0.0
  • for loop performance regression #104655
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #109499
  • JIT: libraries jitstress Assertion failed 'doesVNMatch' during 'Assertion prop' #109745
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: GFNI Intrinsics #96170
    Future
  • Request to Update Target Framework for Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Abstractions #110039
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/MethodImpl/CovariantReturns/UnitTest/UnitTestDelegates/UnitTestDelegates.cmd #109691

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110097
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Only define _XOPEN_SOURCE in configurecompiler.cmake (for consistency) #110092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: filter local assertion set #110091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add global search option to 3-opt layout #110089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Handle hot/cold map lookup in `ExecutionManager.ReadyToRunJitManager.GetMethodInfo` #110087
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Warn on method access in Requires analyzers #110086
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Fix loop index printing #110080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Help finding Brotli headers when doing VMR build under FreeBSD #110079
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110078
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Use any reaching def for unreachable uses in incremental SSA builder #110077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NamedPipeClientStream Connect with SafePipeHandle #110075
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Change assertion in IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet #110070
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Disable ALCTest under GC Stress #109985
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Skip cost improvement check in 3-opt for exceptionally costly layouts #110069
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip ENOSYS filter in numa init #110082
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #109977
    bug, area-System.DirectoryServices, regression-from-last-release, 10.0.0
  • Fold "X relop 0" in assertprop #110076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enlarge stack overflow handling helper stack #110068
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use reaching definitions in CSE to update conservative VNs #109959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't log from property accessors in the ILLink task. #109948
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add GFNI Intrinsics #109537
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add option GCTrimYoungestDividerValue to tune gen0 trim divider #109863
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ReJIT portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #109936
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove 2 more casting helper method frames #110064
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove usage of HP libunwind on Apple platforms #110023
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use the managed signer to remove the code signature from singlefile bundles #110063
    area-Single-File, area-HostModel, 10.0.0
  • Disable transitions test under GC Stress #109986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #109567
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fix an issue with sysconf returning the wrong last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors. #109749
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110057
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110059
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] ILC: Allow OOB reference to upgrade framework assembly #110058
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • [Tests] Add more logging for runtime test timeouts #109998
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't use a GVM in Linq Select with NAOT by default #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Switch back to unpinned 9.0 SDK for micro benchmarks #109992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add left-handed spherical and cylindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #109804
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove some `fgRenumberBlocks` calls #110026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Threads and GC Poll #2806

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Question: Interest in wit-bindgen for c# #2377

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Add support for async struct instance methods (potential implementation 2) #2805

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Automate `WasmDebugging.csproj` via LLDB scripting #2785
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [SwiftBindings] Added TypeMetadata, removed SwiftTypeInfo #2804
  • [SwiftBindings] Describe projecting generic structs #2796
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet format` raises native AOT warnings regardless of `<EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator/>` #45054
  • MSIX packaging for arbitrary .NET project types #45045
  • dotnet list package –vulnerable no longer working with --include-transitive #45037
  • Dotnet build hangs at CoreCompile when specific NuGet package referenced #45036
  • .NET 10 Preview 1 MAUI baseline manifests need to be updated. #45035
  • Solution build always fail with CS2012 "Cannot open dll for writing" errors #45034
  • The Visual Studio version on the .NET 10.0 SDK installer page is incorrect #45032
  • Correctly configuring .NET SDK(s) in a Linux environment #45029

Closed

  • Support ValueTuple in `<Using />` element #42479
  • You need to take back charge of your Linux packaging #44901

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use arcade infra for DEB and RPM build #45047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix relative path matching #45039
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update vs-solutionpersistence to 1.0.23 #45018
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update SB dev container image #44892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44990
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove `global::` from generated global usings #44916
    untriaged, Area-ImplicitUsings
  • [StaticWebAssets] Improve globbing match performance #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Run all steps in a container #44969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2587414 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implicit reference to `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets` #44997
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build installers on Windows in aspnetcore. #44828
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Require await to apply nullable postconditions to task-returning calls #8679
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal]: Null conditional assignment #8677

  • [Proposal]: Delegate Type Arguments Improvements #8675

    Any Time

  • Extension shadowing #7061
  • Null-conditional assignment #6045

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update `field` keyword breaking change diagnostics #76031
  • Area - Editor Config UI - 2 #76030
  • Area - Rename - 2 #76029
  • Compiler Crash on Equality Comparison of a Tuple Casted from dynamic #76028
  • Area - Formatting - 4 #76026
  • Area - Go to Implementation #76020
  • Area - Use Conditional Expression #76018
  • Area - Rename #76016

Closed

  • CS1998 Code Cleanup Fixer deletes comments at the end of the method #65380
    Backlog
  • 'Convert to interpolated string' produces nonsense when involving raw string literal #61256
    18.0
  • Feature "Diagnostic analyzer runner" is currently unavailable due to an internal error (due to an assert) #67015
    Backlog
  • Code CleanUp - Remove unnecessary Using - removes usings from files not in loaded projects/solution #60867
    Backlog
  • When class name is passed into generic argument brackets, unwanted additional spaces are inserted #66794
    18.0
  • Tracking issue for fixers that do not support "fix all" #66812
    Backlog
  • Analyzer feature telemetry #66784
    Backlog
  • Make commenting out code aware of analyzers #66741
    Backlog
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66597
    Backlog
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.visualbasic.basicargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66596
    Backlog
  • BasicArgumentProvider.ImplicitArgumentSwitching is flaky #66533
    Backlog
  • `DeclarationModifiers.From` doesn't handle constant locals #66172
    Backlog
  • Tooltip on `throw` expression keyword shows targeted type instead of exception type #66126
    Backlog
  • SyntaxGenerator.Argument doesn't generate RefKind.In properly #66118
    Backlog
  • Error list UX/functional issue with LSP pull diagnostics enabled #65936
    18.0
  • Intellisense switch expression produces invalid code from `not` pattern #65683
    Backlog
  • CS1591 CodeFix does not work correctly when there is anything but OpenBraceToken #61562
    Backlog
  • InsertMembers with method declarations to an interface declaration causes modifiers to be reset #65545
    Backlog
  • CS1998 proposed fix "Make method synchronous" should not be offered for overrides and interface implementations #65535
    Backlog
  • `Inline temporary variable` adds unnecessary cast and introduces warning #65517
    Backlog
  • MetadataAsSource should show scoped modifiers #64906
    Backlog
  • Quick info on `field` exposes generated member name, unlike on accessors #75529
    17.13 P2
  • IDE0200 is misreported and its editorconfig setting affects IDE0039 #65504
    Backlog
  • Make ReferenceLocation.IsWrittenTo public #65408
    Backlog
  • Add IDExxx rule for converting multiline string to raw string #65405
    Backlog
  • IDE0019 "Use pattern matching" can produce code that is not equivalent to initial code. #65391
    Backlog
  • IDE0010 should not complain about missing default case? #65326
    Backlog
  • Feature 'Missing import discovery' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #62737
    18.0
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35521.198 #76034
  • newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpaddmissingreference.verifyavailablecodeactions (vs2022) #64807
    18.0
  • LSIF Go-to-definition does not work when aliases are involved #64665
    Backlog
  • Inline rename UI navigation from keyboard bugs #64544
    Backlog
  • C# go to implementation feature lists unsuitable implementations #64538
  • Suggest usings for types from available shared frameworks and add required <FrameworkReference /> along with using directive #64505
    Backlog
  • Improve reporting/UI for CS0535: T does not implement interface member M #64500
    18.0
  • Code lens don't work for source-generated files #64348
    18.0
  • WorkCoordinatorTests.AdditionalDocumentOpenedClosedEvents is flaky #64047
    Backlog
  • Format .editorConfig in Visual Studio #63952
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup unable to add lines in between elements when required by style (SA1516) #63950
    Backlog
  • Implement interface abstractly creates concrete explicit members when existing member names conflict with interface member names #63947
    Backlog
  • Source generators have exploded the costs of making skeleton references. #63891
    Backlog
  • SourceText created in didOpen LSP handler needs encoding and checksum algorithm #63583
    Backlog
  • string keyword is added by IntelliSense in error when specifying HtmlAttributes for LabelFor HTML Helper #63558
    Backlog
  • Feature "Symbol Finder" is unavailable due to an internal error. #63479
    Backlog
  • SymbolFinder does not find generated symbols #63375
    Backlog
  • Investigate `indent_size` not respected for first project file and on formatting #63334
    Backlog
  • Provide easy way to opt out of 'implicit usings' #63239
    Backlog
  • [Feature request]auto remove generic correspondent angle brackets #63080
    Backlog
  • `RemoveUnnecessarySuppressionExclusions` shouldn't have roaming location or should be exposed in UI #62784
    Backlog
  • Figure out interaction between design-time and compile-time source generated files in debugging context #63022
    Backlog
  • Why my coding style preferences is not working on visual studio 2022 #62985
    Backlog
  • The Compile ItemGroup intellisense cache is not refreshed when a build finishes #63224
    Backlog
  • 'CSharpMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled #62823
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Support language experiences for roslyn options in editorconfig files #62758
    Backlog
  • Fix all warnings and errors set in EditorConfig should be the default setting in Code Cleanup #62651
    Backlog
  • Square brackets not expanding correctly in Visual Studio #62613
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Diagnostics do not refresh on option change #62495
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Enable Pull Diagnostics #61897
    Backlog
  • Inheritance margin not working for interactive workspace #62229
    Backlog
  • Stack Trace Explorer Accessibility Insights Fix #62206
    Backlog
  • Behavior difference between "a is not X" and "!(a is X)" patterns #62078
    Backlog
  • AccessViolationException in Binder.LookupExtensionMethodsInSingleBinder causes ServiceHub crash #62059
  • IDE0065 - using inside vs. outside #63035
    Backlog
  • Records Feature: convert between primary constructor and traditional constructor #61749
    Backlog
  • Need telemetry for how often a code-action with UI has its UI cancelled. #61694
    Backlog
  • CodeAction telemetry lacks mechanism to provide sub-categories or other relevant pieces of information #61665
    Backlog
  • NRE in `VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider` #61538
    Backlog
  • Remaining work to get 'Background Wait Indicator' sufficient for most of Roslyn, and ready for Platform adoption. #61416
    Backlog
  • Regex parser produces different messages in .NET 6 #61232
    Backlog
  • Update REgexParser to understand `RegexOption.NonBacktracking` once available in the version of the runtime we reference. #61214
    Backlog
  • Bypass Find panel when search returns only one other result #61010
    Backlog
  • Intellisense Method Paramter list to wrap not truncate #60911
    Backlog
  • Show entire string in constant string interpolation tooltip #60890
    Backlog
  • Add a command to expand the C# property { get; set; } #60889
    Backlog
  • IDE0058 is not executed if the method contains #if #60875
    Backlog
  • Using a property inside its own implementation should warn #40935
    Backlog
  • Why C# compiler accepts and compiles so obvious error? #9827
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35521.35 #76014

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 'implement interface' to forward explicit members to implicit ones #76044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not show uncapturable outer parameters inside static local functions. #76043
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enc logging #76042
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix missed case in automatic line ending #76041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make approved api changes #76040
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Remove imports should only format the section of the document that was touched #76038
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Include project diagnostic suppressors in host analyzer execution (target main) #76037
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update data for snap 17.13P2 #76033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix explicit generation of static conversion methods in interfaces #76022
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix parameters not showing up in 'nameof' on a method #76017
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge doc comments across multiple parts #76013
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Keep trivia in 'make method synchronous' #76039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable 'use interpolated string' with raw strings #76021
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Only run Code Cleanup on documents from the VS workspace #76019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include project diagnostic suppressors in host analyzer execution #75684
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove unnecessary parentheses around collection expressions #76023
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix location where inheritdoc doc comment is placed #76024
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add test demonstrating issue doesn't arise #76025
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Keep comments when removing unnecessary lambda expressions #76015
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add the 'scoped' modifier in metadata-as-source #76032
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix symbol display for backing fields #76000
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disable symbol search on generated documents #76027
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Make MaxSupportedLangVersion calculation dynamic #75795
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify tests #75977
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Record "nameof(UnboundGenericType<>)" as done #75982
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: break attribute binding cycles, clone a bunch of C# tests #76008
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The "ResolvedCompressedAssessts" task failed unexpectedly when 9.0.100 and 8.0.404 are installed, only in Visual Studio #59119
  • Perf regression: https #59117
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #59116
  • Latest version 9.0.0 does not support .net core 8 #59115
  • Building the managed part without node installed doesn't work anymore #59114
  • Quarantine WebSocketsOutOfProcessTests #59111
  • CustomElements includes babel.config.json, package.json and tsconfig.json in project #59110
    9.0.x
  • Cascading Parameter is null with SSR /interactive Server #59109
  • ANCM is not stable after upgrading to .net 9 #59107
  • net9 - Type System.Object is not blittable: Not a ValueType #59106
  • Perf regression: caching, single_query #59099
  • Autumn 2024 repo health check #59098
    Discussions

Closed

  • [Blazor] Behavioral breaking change in .NET 8.0 component re-rendering #58417
    Backlog
  • Razor StreamRendering bug with EF Core #54569
  • The SignalR server is suspended and can no longer send messages to the client. #58828

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix source build when using `--no-build-js` #59118
    area-blazor
  • Skip WebSocketOutOfProcessTests on Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open #59112
    area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d144031` to `35d0c36` #59104
    area-infrastructure
  • [Identity] Fix Identity UI asset definitions #59100
    area-identity, 9.0.x

Merged

  • [Infrastructure] Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24572.2 #59103
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Update Weather.razor #58955
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • perf: improve allocations in `OwinEnvironment` #58917
    Perf, area-networking
  • Build installers at the end of the repo build and allow building with desktop msbuild #58987
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • no dispatchGlobalEventToAllElements when no renderer attached #58667
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Harden parsing of [Range] attribute values #59077
    area-mvc, 9.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] TabbedPage current page indicator can be wrong. #26069
    Backlog
  • CollectionViewHandler2 RelativeSource binding to AncestorType not working #26066
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • CollectionViewHandler2 null reference exception if ItemsLayout is set for Tablet but NOT Phone #26065
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Mac Catalyst] DeviceDisplay.KeepScreenOn not being respected on Mac OS #26059
    Backlog
  • [iOS & Mac] Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26057
  • [MAUI] An error 'XAPRAS7004 :System.ArgumentException: must not be null or emptyParameter name: abi ...'will happen when building the existing Projects recipeSearch & ManualMauiTests #26056
  • [MAUI] The APP will become not responded on windows platform on a remote-connected machine after some random operations on the local machine #26055
  • [MAUI] An error NETSDK1082 will happen when opening the existing Projects recipeSearch & ManualMauiTests #26054
  • [9.0.100] NETSDK1083: RuntimeIdentifier 'win10-x86' is not recognized in .NET 9.0 for .NET 8 Target Framework with Evergine 2024.6.28.781 #26052
  • The Unloaded events of the page is not triggered when navigating to next page on android #26050
  • ShellContent Title Does Not Update at Runtime #26049
  • Build stuck on Extracting Extracting ...\XamarinBuildDownloadCache\GMps-9.1.1.tgz to ...\XamarinBuildDownloadCache\GMps-9.1.1 #26045

Closed

  • Can not launch app after adding Entitlements.plist for MacCataylst #23548
  • provide a properly configured and signed bearer token and make sure that it has not expired visual studio #26047
  • [iOS] Images from paths refuse to load in UI #19833
  • [Windows] `Controls.Sample.Sandbox` cannot be compiled with `PublishReadyToRun=True` #22952
  • [Android] Text Clipping Issue in Entry with Long Strings #23774
    Backlog
  • Display the text from the beginning part when the Entry control loses focus #23054
    Backlog
  • I think you mean that the ellipses inside the `if`s stand for the code you want executed _only_ on change? Then that implementation would make sense. #21832
  • [MAUI]Clicking the "I5_EmptyView with EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector" page throws an exception #25224
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Focused event is triggered infinitely on editor control #26043
  • App fails to inject INavigationRootManager when using PushModalAsync #25833
    Backlog
  • There is a rogue FluentUI.cs in Resources/Fonts #25928
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Android keystore parameter is relative to the project path not the working directory. #22671
  • [Android] Span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #23801
    .NET 9 SR2
  • MAUI app build is broken with .NET 8.0.403 #25179
  • IsPlatformEnabled is false for RoundRectangle stroke shape of a Border, hence the layouts that are part of the Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility and their derivateves are not rendered #21390
  • A Grid in a ListView - Why won't it render properly in Android? #25533
  • Ios crash when returning from background #25449
  • no me sale las llaves en esta parte #25566
  • Collection View not populating with Observable Collection in Android #25633
  • [.NET 8]Shell's return arrow appears on the mainpage. #18867
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26073
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Always propagate the BC to the ControlTemplate #26072
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26071
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Remove Legacy Gallery from SLNs #26068
  • [iOS] Fixed the RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not firing issue in CollectionView #26067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for DatePicker displays incorrect date selection when navigating to next month. #26064
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Fixed Using safe area causes white area at the top upon entry focus #26063
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix ShellContent Title Does Not Update at Runtime #26062
    community ✨
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed An issue with Microsoft.Maui.Animations when testing a custom busy indicator control. #26051
    area-animation, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix grid not getting invalidated when changing the Height/Width of Row/ColumnDefinitions declared with the short syntax #26046
    area-layout, community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 12 #25917
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 15 #25990
    area-testing, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Remove the sample font file #26036
    area-templates
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2

Updated

  • Updated the Blazor Hybrid Solution template to work better with the dotnet cli or IDEs that rely on it. #25997
    area-blazor, area-templates, community ✨
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • fix: fix 23131 can't reuse BottomItem's tabEnabled #23132

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling Migrate on a database containing tables but no history throws #35181
  • SYSTEM_VERSIONING = OFF in EF8 migration causes SYSTEM_VERSIONING is not turned ON in EF9 #35180
  • Could not load type AdHocMapper after upgrading from 8 to 9 #35179

Closed

  • Regression from EF Core 8 to 9: Invalid migration scripts involving multiple Temporal Tables #35176
  • ExecuteUpdate on Nullable stop working after migration from 8 to 9 #35164
  • CA8618 is no longer suppressed in DbContext after updating Visual Studio to 17.12.1 #35178
  • PendingModelChangesWarning when migrating from .NET 8 to .NET 9 with multitenancy per schema #35182

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable Cosmos vector search on EF9 #35183
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35177

Updated

  • Return null when the type is nullable for Cosmos Max/Min/Average #35173
